title: Social-Emotional Learning (SEL) Integrated Teaching Methods Workshop for Novice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching basic mathematics and fundamental understanding of educational settings
context.additional_context: A corporate in-service training program for working learners, blending online and offline instruction with digital tools. Applies SEL techniques based on math teaching experience.

learning_goals: Learners can foster a collaborative environment among students by utilizing social-emotional learning (SEL) strategies in classroom conflict situations.
Learners can propose ways to mitigate uncooperative attitudes by applying emotional empathy techniques when communicating with parents.
Learners can transform problem behaviors occurring during math classes into positive behavior support strategies based on SEL.

resources: Math curriculum SEL integration lesson design guide

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
